snippet: An appeals ruling, which held that the trial judge erred in instructing jurors, came in a case in which the defendant was said to have assisted in a suicide.
abstract: Appeals ruling on case in which defendant Kenneth Minor was convicted of assisting in suicide of Jeffrey Locker, motivational speaker and father of three from Long Island, finds trial judge erred in instructing jurors.
lead_paragraph: An appeals ruling, which held that the trial judge erred in instructing jurors, came in a case in which the defendant was said to have assisted in a suicide.

headline.main: New Trial Ordered for Man Who Helped a Long Island Motivational Speaker Kill Himself
headline.print_headline: New Trial Ordered for Man Who Helped a Long Island Motivational Speaker Kill Himself
